languages.text: "Благодаря вам, Лорд-капитан, род Версериан спасен, хотя едва не был уничтожен из-за интриг извне и неосмотрительности внутри самой семьи". {n}Абеляр ненадолго замолкает, вглядываясь в даль.{/n} "Иногда я думаю о том, что мог бы многому их научить. Убедиться, что в будущем без меня они смогут уцелеть".

traits.locale_text: "Благодаря вам, Лорд-капитан, род Версериан спасен, хотя едва не был уничтожен из-за интриг извне и неосмотрительности внутри самой семьи". {n}Абеляр ненадолго замолкает, вглядываясь в даль.{/n} "Иногда я думаю о том, что мог бы многому их научить, но не уверен, что мое место рядом с ними".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, House Werserian is saved, although it came close to being wiped out as a result of scheming without and imprudence within." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, staring off into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. I could ensure that they survive in the future, without me."
languages.original_text: "Благодаря вам, Лорд-капитан, род Версериан спасен, хотя едва не был уничтожен из-за интриг извне и неосмотрительности внутри самой семьи". {n}Абеляр ненадолго замолкает, вглядываясь в даль.{/n} "Иногда я думаю о том, что мог бы многому их научить. Убедиться, что в будущем без меня они смогут уцелеть".

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, the Werserian family is saved, although it was almost destroyed due to the outside intrigues and imprudence among the family members themselves." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, looking into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. To make sure that they can survive in the future, without me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, the Werserian family is saved, although it was almost destroyed due to the outside intrigues and imprudence among the family members themselves." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, looking into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. To make sure that they can survive in the future, without me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, the Werserian family is saved, although it was close to being wiped out in the wake of the outside scheming and imprudence among the family members themselves." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, peering into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. I could make sure that they would survive in the future, without me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, the Werserian family is saved, although it was close to being wiped out in the wake of the outside scheming and imprudence among the family members themselves." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, peering into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. I could make sure that they would survive in the future, without me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, House Werserian is saved, although it came close to being wiped out as a result of scheming without and imprudence within." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, staring off into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. I could ensure that they survive in the future, without me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, House Werserian is saved, although it came close to being wiped out as a result of scheming without and imprudence within." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, staring off into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. I could ensure that they survive in the future, without me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ウェルザリアン家を救っていただいたことに感謝いたします、ロード・キャプテン。部外者の陰謀と一族の者の軽率さの結果、危うくウェルザリアン家は絶えるところでした」{n}アベラルドは少し間をおいて、どこか遠くを見る。{/n}「時折思うのです、我は後進にどれだけのことを教えられただろうかと。私がいなくなっても、一族がこの先を生き延びられるようにしなくてはなりません」
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, House Werserian is saved, although it came close to being wiped out as a result of scheming without and imprudence within." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, staring off into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. I could ensure that they survive in the future, without me."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルザリアン家を救っていただいたことに感謝いたします、ロード・キャプテン。部外者の陰謀と一族の者の軽率さの結果、危うくウェルザリアン家は絶えるところでした」{n}アベラルドは少し間をおいて、どこか遠くを見る。{/n}「時折思うのです、我は後進にどれだけのことを教えられただろうかと。私がいなくなっても、一族がこの先を生き延びられるようにしなくてはなりません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，谢谢您保住了韦尔森家族。我的家族差点就在敌人的阴谋诡计与他们自己的轻率行径中覆灭。”{n}阿贝拉德顿了顿，望向远方。{/n}“有时我也会想，我到底应该教给他们什么，才能确保在我百年之后，这个家族仍然能够开枝散叶、福泽长存。”
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, House Werserian is saved, although it came close to being wiped out as a result of scheming without and imprudence within." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, staring off into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. I could ensure that they survive in the future, without me."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，谢谢您保住了韦尔森一家，不致于让我的家族在敌人的阴谋诡计与家人的轻率行径中覆灭。”{n}阿贝拉德顿了顿，望向远方。{/n}“有时我也会想，我到底应该教给他们什么，才能确保在我百年之后，这个家族仍然能够开枝散叶、福泽长存。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « À cause des manigances des autres familles nobles et de l'imprudence de ses propres membres, la famille Werserian n'est pas passée loin de l'extinction. Si mes proches sont encore en vie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, c'est uniquement grâce à vous. » {n}Abélard marque une pause, le regard perdu à l'horizon.{/n} « Je pense parfois à tout ce que je pourrais leur apprendre. Pour qu'ils survivent aux incertitudes de l'avenir sans moi. »
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, House Werserian is saved, although it came close to being wiped out as a result of scheming without and imprudence within." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, staring off into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. I could ensure that they survive in the future, without me."

traits.locale_text: « À cause des manigances et de l'imprudence des autres familles nobles, les Werserian ne sont pas passés loin de l'extinction. Si mes proches sont encore en vie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, c'est uniquement grâce à vous. » {n}Abélard marque une pause, le regard perdu à l'horizon.{/n} « Je pense parfois à tout ce que je pourrais leur apprendre. Pour qu'ils survivent aux incertitudes de l'avenir sans moi. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias a usted, Lord Capitán, la casa Werserian está a salvo, a pesar de haber estado a punto de desaparecer a raíz de las confabulaciones externas y las imprudencias internas». {n}Abelard hace una pausa, mirando hacia lo lejos.{/n} «A veces pienso en lo mucho que podría enseñarles. Podría asegurarme de que sobrevivieran en el futuro sin mí».
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, House Werserian is saved, although it came close to being wiped out as a result of scheming without and imprudence within." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, staring off into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. I could ensure that they survive in the future, without me."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias a usted, Lord Capitán, la familia Werserian está a salvo, a pesar de haber estado a punto de desaparecer a raíz de las confabulaciones e imprudencias que salían desde dentro». {n}Abelard hace una pausa, mirando hacia lo lejos.{/n} «A veces pienso en lo mucho que podría enseñarles. Podría asegurarme de que sobrevivieran en el futuro sin mí».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Dank Euch, Lord Captain, wurde die Familie Werserian gerettet. Auch wenn sie fast ausgelöscht worden wäre, durch die Intrigen von außen und die Unbedarftheit der Familienmitglieder selbst." {n}Abelard hält kurz inne und starrt in die Ferne.{/n} "Manchmal denke ich darüber nach, wie viel ich ihnen beibringen könnte. Ich könnte dafür sorgen, dass sie in der Zukunft überleben, ohne mich."
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, House Werserian is saved, although it came close to being wiped out as a result of scheming without and imprudence within." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, staring off into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. I could ensure that they survive in the future, without me."

traits.locale_text: "Dank Euch, Lord Captain, wurde die Familie Werserian gerettet. Auch wenn sie durch die Intrigen von außen und die Unbedarftheit der Familienmitglieder selbst fast ausgelöscht worden wäre." {n}Abelard hält kurz inne und starrt in die Ferne.{/n} "Manchmal denke ich darüber nach, wie viel ich ihnen beibringen könnte. Ich könnte dafür sorgen, dass sie in der Zukunft überleben, ohne mich."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, dış mihrakların oyunlarından ve içimizdeki ihtiyatsızlıklardan mütevellit ortadan kalkmaya yüz tutmuş Werserian Hanesi, sayenizde kurtuldu." {n}Abelard, bir an için susup uzaklara dalıyor.{/n} "Bazen onlara ne kadar çok şey öğretebileceğimi düşünüyorum. Yarın bir gün ben yanlarında olmadığımda da sağ kalmalarını sağlayabilirim."
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, Lord Captain, House Werserian is saved, although it came close to being wiped out as a result of scheming without and imprudence within." {n}Abelard pauses for a moment, staring off into the distance.{/n} "Sometimes I think about how much I could teach them. I could ensure that they survive in the future, without me."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, dış mihrakların oyunlarından ve içimizdeki ihtiyatsızlıklardan mütevellit sona ermeye yüz tutmuş Werserian Hanesi sayenizde kurtuldu." {n}Abelard bir an için susup uzaklara dalıyor.{/n} "Bazen onlara ne kadar çok şey öğretebileceğimi düşünüyorum. Yarın bir gün, ben olmadığımda baki kalmalarını sağlayabilirim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
